item.description:
Come join me Sunday July 11, 2010 at noon for a day of great music, great food, and a great time Italian Style.
LIVE MUSIC ALL DAY LONG, Bring a picnic basket and your favorite bottle of vino and lets party Italian style.



Vendor Specialty/Other Food
Angela Mia Bakery Italian Desserts
Calise Pasta
Bobby Q's Barbeque & Grill Barbeque Ribs
Carvel Soft Ice Cream
Four Brothers Greek Food
Italia Restaurant Pizza and Bruscetta
Jasmine Oriental Selections
Westport Fishing Company Lobsters and Clam Chowder
Norwalk Sons of Italy Sausage & Pepper Grinders Meatball Grinders
St. Ann's Club Pizza Frite
Italia HotDog Stand Hot Dogs and Hamburgers
Lyd's Dough Shop Zeppole and Funnel Cakes
Other Vendors
Vendor Art/Craft
Italian Novelties
PatriaPets Dog Supplies
Kempo Academy of Martial Arts
Caricatures by Domenico
Novelty Booth Miscellaneous Novelties
